title: Hybrid Synchronous Language Learning: Activity-Based Simulation/VR Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and fundamental digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment focused on strengthening workplace-linked language proficiency for in-service professionals, combining in-person classes with real-time video/ virtual space participation

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform job-related dialogue scenarios in five VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners complete 90% of language tasks through real-time collaboration with peers in blended synchronous environments.
Learners conduct at least one weekly 1:1 feedback session with instructors using digital tools (video conferencing, virtual whiteboards).

resources: VR Headsets (20 Units Provided by Institution)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
